sign_up_form_submit_error: Oops! An error has occurred creating the account.
sign_up_form_global_information: To continue with your order, the information below is required.
sign_up_form_global_information_kyc_remi: Please remember to fill in every field and confirm that your personal details match the name and address in your official documents before placing your order.
The address must match the one on the proof of address for identity verification.
